entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
